summary: The diff appears to implement all three requested visual updates: spark VFX on bulletâ€“obstacle hits (with lifetime/cleanup fields), per-obstacle consistent neon colors, and fixed-size flame-shaped bullets oriented to travel direction. The diff also includes additional unrelated rendering/canvas behavior changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Canvas resizing behavior updated to use `window.visualViewport` and additional resize/orientation listeners for mobile support.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-37/38/39; this is an extra behavior change unrelated to sparks, obstacle colors, or bullet shape/size.

hallucinated_features.description: Player ship rendering appears to have been (re)implemented as a more detailed neon vector graphic (body, cockpit, engine glow, wing details).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for spark VFX, obstacle colors, and bullet visuals; ship visual redesign is outside scope.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded bullet typing supports multiple shapes (`circle|diamond|capsule|flame`) and still retains bullet size categories in types/config despite the request focusing only on consistent flame visuals.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-39 only requires consistent-size flame-shaped rendering; introducing additional shape variants/types was not requested (even if not exposed).
